Common Information

Hi there, My name is Yurii Ishchenko. I’m PHP developer/architect.

This site is about web development, business processes, algorithms and other programming related things. I’m facing different professional challendges every day and there are no usually complete solutions to them. So here I put pieces of my experience to use them in future and maybe my thoutghts will be helpfull for somebody else.
